metadata.inclusion:
1. Hold the control button for 7 seconds until the LED blinks amber
2. Tap the control button one time
3. The LED will quickly flash green and then turn off and blink green 3 times upon successful inclusion
metadata.exclusion: Hold the control button for 7 seconds until the LED turns amber, then tap the control button one time. The LED will quickly flash green upon successful exclusion.
metadata.reset: Hold the control button down for 14 seconds. The LED will blink red/amber upon successful reset.
